page.title: 10TRAFFIC AND THE VILLAGE
page.content:
The A31, passing through the village, is a very busy and dangerous road. It now by-passes many of the towns and villages along its route and for much of its length it is dual carriage-way. It is a cause of great concern that despite having been in a number of local plans Bentley's by-pass has not been built and the very heavy traffic flow still uses the single carriage- way through the village at 40 mph..
There are frequent accidents on the A31 within the village, fortunately none fatal in recent times. One of the boys engaged on this project suffered multiple fractures when involved in one such accident. We hope that the by-pass will be built by 1990, as promised, before fatal accidents occur due to the ever increasing weight of the growing traffic flow.
